resp = client.ml.evaluate_data_frame(
    index="house_price_predictions",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "filter": [
                {
                    "term": {
                        "ml.is_training": False
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },
    evaluation={
        "regression": {
            "actual_field": "price",
            "predicted_field": "ml.price_prediction",
            "metrics": {
                "r_squared": {},
                "mse": {},
                "msle": {
                    "offset": 10
                },
                "huber": {
                    "delta": 1.5
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
